duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee all phases of the custom home building process, ensuring projects are completed on time and within scope and budget.
Work closely with the design team, architect, engineers, and subcontractors to develop plans, establish timelines, and calculate labor and material costs.
Effectively monitor and present project updates to relevant stakeholders, clients, and project team members.
Coach and support project team members with tasks assigned to them.
Manage construction bids, equipment, and materials, ensuring compliance with safety regulations.
Act as the main point of contact for communication with clients on project updates.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Building Construction, Construction Management, Civil Engineering, Architecture, or equivalent experience. (Master's preferred)
